docs: Main program module containing all instruction handlers
- Each instruction has specific access control requirements
- Input validation is performed at instruction level

instructions.name: add_investment_record
docs: - Transfers tokens from recipient to vault
- Records investment amounts and stage information

accounts.name: investment_info
docs: - Validates investment exists and is active

accounts.name: investment_record
docs: - Derived from investment_id, version, batch_id, record_id, account_id

accounts.name: usdt_mint
docs: AUDIT: Must match expected USDT mint address

accounts.name: hcoin_mint
docs: AUDIT: Must match expected H2COIN mint address

accounts.name: recipient_account
docs: - Source of token transfers to vault

accounts.name: recipient_usdt_account
docs: Recipient associated token account for USDT

accounts.name: recipient_hcoin_account
docs: Recipient associated token account for H2COIN

accounts.name: payer
docs: AUDIT: Pays for account creation and token transfers

accounts.name: associated_token_program
docs: Associated token program for ATA creation

instructions.name: completed_investment_info
docs: - Prevents further modifications to investment info

accounts.name: investment_info
docs: - Must be mutable for state change

instructions.name: deactivate_investment_info
docs: - Only allowed when investment is completed
- Prevents all further operations on this investment

instructions.name: deposit_sol_to_vault
docs: - Transfers SOL from signer to vault

docs: - Validates investment exists and is active

accounts.name: payer
docs: AUDIT: Pays for SOL transfer and transaction fees

docs: AUDIT: Must be USDT or H2COIN mint

accounts.name: from
docs: - Source of token transfers to vault

docs: Vault PDA account for token storage

accounts.name: vault_token_account
docs: Vault associated token account for destination

docs: AUDIT: Pays for token transfers and transaction fees

accounts.name: associated_token_program

instructions.name: estimate_profit_share
docs: - Calculates profit distribution for all valid records
- Creates profit share cache for batch processing

accounts.name: cache

docs: AUDIT: Pays for cache creation and transaction fees

instructions.name: estimate_refund_share

- Creates refund share cache for batch processing

docs: - Derived from investment_id, version, batch_id, and year_index

docs: AUDIT: Pays for cache creation and transaction fees

- Validates stage ratios and whitelist configurations
- Stage ratio validation (0-100%, contiguous non-zero values)

errors.name: NumericalOverflow
errors.msg: Math overflow.

errors.name: UnauthorizedSigner
errors.msg: Unauthorized signer or not enough signatures.

errors.name: WhitelistLengthInvalid
errors.msg: Withdraw whitelist must be between 1 and 5 entries.

errors.name: InvalidInvestmentIdLength
errors.msg: Investment ID is too long or too short, must be 15 bytes.

errors.name: InvalidStageRatioLength
errors.msg: stage_ratio length per stage must be exactly 10 elements.

errors.name: InvalidStageRatioValue
errors.msg: Stage ratio value must be between 0 and 100.

errors.name: InvalidStageRatioSum
errors.msg: Stage ratio sum for a single stage must not exceed 100.

errors.name: NonContiguousStage
errors.msg: Stage ratio must be contiguous once non-zero values begin.

errors.name: EmptyStageRatio
errors.msg: All stage ratio values are zero.

errors.name: InvestmentInfoNotFound
errors.msg: Investment info not exists.

errors.name: InvestmentInfoNotCompleted
errors.msg: Investment info has not completed yet.

errors.name: InvestmentInfoHasCompleted
errors.msg: Investment info has completed already.

errors.name: InvestmentInfoDeactivated
errors.msg: Investment info has been deactivated and can no longer be modified.

errors.name: InvalidInvestmentInfoPda
errors.msg: The derived PDA does not match the expected investment info PDA.

errors.name: RecordIdMismatch
errors.msg: Record ID mismatch.

errors.name: AccountIdMismatch
errors.msg: Account ID mismatch.

errors.name: InvalidAccountIdLength
errors.msg: Account ID is too long or too short, must be 15 bytes.

errors.name: InvestmentRecordNotFound
errors.msg: Investment record not found.

errors.name: InvalidRecordPda
errors.msg: The derived PDA does not match the expected investment record PDA.

errors.name: NoRecordsInRemainingAccounts
errors.msg: There are not investment records in remainingAccounts.

errors.name: RecordAlreadyRevoked
errors.msg: This record has been revoked already.

errors.name: NoRecordsUpdated
errors.msg: No record has been updated.

errors.name: WhitelistMustBeFive
errors.msg: Whitelist must contain exactly 5 members

errors.name: WhitelistAddressExists
errors.msg: Target address already exists in whitelist

errors.name: WhitelistAddressNotFound
errors.msg: Address to be replaced not found in whitelist

errors.name: InvalidVaultPda
errors.msg: Invalid Vault PDA

errors.name: InvalidTokenMint
errors.msg: Vault token account mint is not USDT or H2coin.

errors.name: InvalidVaultAta
errors.msg: The provided vault ATA does not match the expected associated token address.

errors.name: InvalidRecipientMint
errors.msg: Recipient token account mint is not USDT or H2coin.

errors.name: InvalidVaultOwner
errors.msg: Vault token account owner mismatch.

errors.name: InvalidFromOwner
errors.msg: From token account owner mismatch.

errors.name: InvalidRecipientOwner
errors.msg: Recipient token account owner mismatch.

errors.name: StandardOnly
errors.msg: Investment type must be `Standard`.

errors.name: TotalShareMismatch
errors.msg: Total share does not match.

errors.name: ProfitCacheNotFound
errors.msg: Profit share cache not found.

errors.name: ProfitCacheExpired
errors.msg: Profit share cache has expired (older than 25 days)

errors.name: ProfitAlreadyExecuted
errors.msg: Profit already executed.

errors.name: InsufficientTokenBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient USDT token balance in vault

errors.name: InsufficientSolBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient SOL balance in vault to cover estimated gas cost

errors.name: InvalidTotalUsdt
errors.msg: Total USDT cannot be 0 or undefined

errors.name: BatchIdMismatch
errors.msg: Batch id does not match expected number.

errors.name: TooManyRecordsLoaded
errors.msg: Too many records have been loaded.

errors.name: MissingAssociatedTokenAccount
errors.msg: Missing associated token account.

errors.name: InvalidProfitCachePda
errors.msg: The derived PDA does not match the expected profit cache PDA.

errors.name: BpRatioOverflow
errors.msg: Bp ratio overflowed u16.

errors.name: DuplicateRecord
errors.msg: Duplicate record_id detected in input records.

errors.name: RefundCacheExpired
errors.msg: Refund share cache has expired (older than 25 days)

errors.name: RefundCacheNotFound
errors.msg: Refund share cache not found.

errors.name: RefundPeriodInvalid
errors.msg: Refund period is invalid

errors.name: RefundAlreadyExecuted
errors.msg: Refund share already executed.

errors.name: InvalidRecipientATA
errors.msg: Invalid Recipient ATA

errors.name: InvalidTotalH2coin
errors.msg: Total H2coin cannot be 0 or undefined

errors.name: InvalidRefundCachePda
errors.msg: The derived PDA does not match the expected refund cache PDA.

errors.name: EmptyWhitelist
errors.msg: Whitelist must contain at least one wallet.

errors.name: InvalidRecipientAddress
errors.msg: Invalid Recipient wallet Address

errors.name: UnauthorizedRecipient
errors.msg: Recipient wallet is not in the withdraw whitelist.

errors.name: InvalidAssociatedTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid associated token account.

errors.name: InvalidTokenProgramID
errors.msg: Invalid token program ID. Must be Token 2020(Legacy).

errors.name: InvalidAssociatedTokenProgramID
errors.msg: Invalid associated token program ID.

types.name: InvestmentInfo
docs: - Contains all investment parameters and configuration
- Manages whitelists for different operation types
- Central control point for all investment operations

fields.name: investment_id
docs: AUDIT: Must be exactly 15 bytes, used for PDA derivation
SECURITY: Prevents ID manipulation and ensures unique identification

fields.name: version
docs: AUDIT: Used for versioning and PDA derivation
SECURITY: Enables version control and prevents version confusion

fields.name: investment_type
docs: SECURITY: Controls access to profit distribution features

fields.name: stage_ratio
docs: Refund percentage ratios for each stage and year
SECURITY: Must be validated to prevent mathematical errors

fields.name: investment_upper_limit
docs: SECURITY: Controls fund exposure and risk management

fields.name: execute_whitelist
docs: SECURITY: Controls access to critical financial operations

fields.name: update_whitelist
docs: Whitelist for investment info update operations
SECURITY: Controls access to configuration changes

fields.name: withdraw_whitelist
docs: SECURITY: Controls access to fund withdrawals

fields.name: vault
docs: Vault PDA address for fund storage
AUDIT: Derived from investment_id and version
SECURITY: Prevents vault spoofing and ensures proper fund storage

fields.name: is_active
docs: AUDIT: Prevents operations on deactivated investments
SECURITY: Final state control for terminated investments

fields.name: created_at
docs: SECURITY: Provides temporal context for operations

types.name: InvestmentInfoCompleted
docs: Event emitted when investment info is marked as completed
- Includes all signers for multisig accountability

fields.name: investment_id
docs: AUDIT: Unique identifier for the investment
SECURITY: Enables tracking of specific investments

fields.name: version
docs: AUDIT: Links to specific code version

fields.name: updated_by
docs: The updater of this investment info

fields.name: updated_at
docs: AUDIT: Completion time for audit trail

fields.name: signers
docs: All signers involved in the multisig operation
AUDIT: Complete signer list for accountability

types.name: InvestmentInfoDeactivated
docs: Event emitted when investment info is deactivated
- Includes all signers for multisig accountability

fields.name: investment_id
docs: AUDIT: Unique identifier for the investment
SECURITY: Enables tracking of specific investments

fields.name: version
docs: AUDIT: Links to specific code version

fields.name: deactivated_by
docs: The deactivator of this investment info

fields.name: deactivated_at
docs: AUDIT: Deactivation time for audit trail

fields.name: signers
docs: All signers involved in the multisig operation
AUDIT: Complete signer list for accountability

types.name: InvestmentInfoInitialized
docs: Event emitted when a new investment info is initialized
- Tracks creation of new investment configurations
- Includes vault PDA for fund tracking
- Provides audit trail for investment setup
- Enables monitoring of new investment creation
- Includes vault address for fund tracking

fields.name: investment_id
docs: AUDIT: Unique identifier for the investment
SECURITY: Enables tracking of specific investments

fields.name: version
docs: AUDIT: Links to specific code version

fields.name: vault
docs: Vault PDA used to store funds

fields.name: created_by
docs: The initializer of this investment info
AUDIT: Accountable party for investment creation

fields.name: created_at
docs: AUDIT: Creation time for audit trail

types.name: InvestmentRecord
docs: - Links to investment info and investor
- Used for profit and refund calculations
- Immutable once created (can only be revoked)

fields.name: batch_id
docs: AUDIT: Used for batch processing and cache creation

fields.name: record_id
docs: AUDIT: Must be unique within batch

fields.name: account_id
docs: AUDIT: Used for record identification and PDA derivation

fields.name: investment_id
docs: AUDIT: Links record to investment info

fields.name: version
docs: AUDIT: Links record to specific investment version

fields.name: stage
docs: AUDIT: Used for refund percentage calculation

fields.name: revoked_at
docs: AUDIT: Prevents revoked records from distributions

types.name: InvestmentRecordAdded
docs: Event emitted when a new investment record is added
- Tracks creation of individual investment records
- Includes all signers for multisig accountability
- Provides audit trail for investment tracking

fields.name: investment_id
docs: AUDIT: Unique identifier for the investment
SECURITY: Enables tracking of specific investments

fields.name: version
docs: AUDIT: Links to specific code version

fields.name: record_id
docs: AUDIT: Links to specific investment record

fields.name: amount_usdt
docs: AUDIT: Investment amount for profit calculations

fields.name: added_by
docs: The adder of this investment record
AUDIT: Accountable party for record creation

fields.name: added_at
docs: AUDIT: Creation time for audit trail

fields.name: signers
docs: All signers involved in the multisig operation
AUDIT: Complete signer list for accountability

types.name: InvestmentRecordRevoked
docs: Event emitted when an investment record is revoked
- Includes all signers for multisig accountability
- Provides audit trail for record invalidation
- Prevents further operations on revoked records

fields.name: signers

fields.name: account_id
docs: AUDIT: Links entry to specific account

fields.name: amount_usdt
docs: AUDIT: Calculated based on investment amount and profit ratio

types.name: ProfitShareCache
docs: Profit share cache account for batch processing

fields.name: batch_id
docs: Batch identifier for this profit share entry
AUDIT: Links cache to specific batch of records

fields.name: investment_id
docs: AUDIT: Links profit share to specific investment

fields.name: version
docs: AUDIT: Links profit share to specific investment version

fields.name: subtotal_profit_usdt
docs: Total USDT amount to be distributed
AUDIT: Must match sum of all entries

fields.name: subtotal_estimate_sol
docs: AUDIT: Used for gas cost estimation

fields.name: entries
docs: List of profit share entries for this batch
AUDIT: Up to 30 entries per batch
SECURITY: Limits batch size for efficiency

docs: Event emitted when profit share is estimated

- Records estimated amounts and gas costs

fields.name: signers
